## Description {#details}

Base class for all errors indicating malformed binary files.

Having a subclass for all malformed binary files allows archive-walking code to skip malformed files without having to understand every possible way that a binary file might be malformed.

Currently inherits from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ecerror">ECError</a> for easy interoperability with std::error&#95;code, but this will be removed in the future.

Definition at line 52 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/error-h">Error.h</a>.
